results.tunables:
### Tunables ###

# Remove structures, whose centroid lies within that distance [µm] of a border
# type: float
mycelyso.tunables.BorderArtifactRemovalBorderSize=10.0

# Whether to run the rectangular microfluidic growth structure detection as ROI detection
# type: bool
mycelyso.tunables.BoxDetection=True

# Clean up step: Sigma [µm] used for Gaussian filter
# type: float
mycelyso.tunables.CleanUpGaussianSigma=0.075

# Clean up step: Threshold used after Gaussian filter (values range from 0 to 1)
# type: float
mycelyso.tunables.CleanUpGaussianThreshold=0.5

# Clean up step: Maximum size of holes [µm²] which will be filled
# type: float
mycelyso.tunables.CleanUpHoleFillSize=1.0

# Crop value (vertical) of the image [pixels]
# type: int
mycelyso.tunables.CropHeight=0

# Crop value (horizontal) of the image [pixels]
# type: int
mycelyso.tunables.CropWidth=0

# Radius in which endpoints are going to be merged [µm]
# type: float
mycelyso.tunables.NodeEndpointMergeRadius=0.5

# Radius in which junctions are going to be merged [µm]
# type: float
mycelyso.tunables.NodeJunctionMergeRadius=0.5

# Radius at which nodes will be ignored if they are further away [µm]
# type: float
mycelyso.tunables.NodeLookupCutoffRadius=2.5

# Radius in which nodes will be searched for found pixel structures [µm]
# type: float
mycelyso.tunables.NodeLookupRadius=0.5

# Maximum search radius for endpoints [µm·h⁻¹]
# type: float
mycelyso.tunables.NodeTrackingEndpointShiftRadius=100.0

# Maximum search radius for junctions [µm·h⁻¹]
# type: float
mycelyso.tunables.NodeTrackingJunctionShiftRadius=5.0

# Remove structures up to this size [µm²]
# type: float
mycelyso.tunables.RemoveSmallStructuresSize=10.0

# Whether to directly use the input image as binary mask. Use in case external binarization is desired.
# type: bool
mycelyso.tunables.SkipBinarization=False

# Whether to store images in the resulting HDF5. This leads to a potentially much larger output file.
# type: bool
mycelyso.tunables.StoreImage=False

# Tracking, maximum covered area ratio at which tracking is still performed
# type: float
mycelyso.tunables.TrackingMaximumCoverage=0.2

# Tracking, maximal relative shrinkage
# type: float
mycelyso.tunables.TrackingMaximumRelativeShrinkage=0.2

# Tracking, maximum tip elongation rate [µm·h⁻¹]
# type: float
mycelyso.tunables.TrackingMaximumTipElongationRate=100.0

# Tracking, minimal hyphae gained length in track filter [µm]
# type: float
mycelyso.tunables.TrackingMinimalGrownLength=5.0

# Tracking, minimal hyphae end length in track filter [µm]
# type: float
mycelyso.tunables.TrackingMinimalMaximumLength=10.0

# Tracking, minimum tip elongation rate [µm·h⁻¹]
# type: float
mycelyso.tunables.TrackingMinimumTipElongationRate=-0.0

# Tracking, minimal timesteps in track filter [#]
# type: int
mycelyso.tunables.TrackingMinimumTrackedPointCount=5
